text: The name Julia has been used for three tropical cyclones in the Atlantic Ocean and one subtropical medicane. In the Atlantic: * Hurricane Julia (2010) – Category 4 hurricane * Tropical Storm Julia (2016) – weak tropical storm * Hurricane Julia (2022) – Category 1 hurricane In the Mediterranean: * Cyclone Julia (2012) – brought heavy flooding and hurricane conditions to parts of Europe, the Mediterranean region and North Africa * Category:Weather lists
title: List of storms named Julia
